buginformation.description: when attempting compile the following code with default options jar compiler jar filename always produces the same error function switch case switch return else return undefined break whenever try and compile the above script get runtime exception thrown internal compiler error please report this problem null node break test break parent null the result calling version compiler jar version 20100917 revision 440 built 2010 the result calling version java exe java version quot quot java runtime environment build java hot spot client build mixed mode sharing anyone else with the same issue work around the short term comment out the quot break quot line thanks for the report this issue was closed revision 676
